files.description: Module for searching words in the loaded Quran data. Includes functions for word and phrase searches, occurrence counting, verse range filtering, and gematrical value calculation based on the Abjad numeral mapping.

functions.name: search_word_in_quran
functions.description: Search for a word in the Quran verses. Iterates over the provided Quran data and returns a list of verses containing the search word. Supports both case-sensitive and case-insensitive search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: A list of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: search_word
parameters.description: The word to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag to indicate case-sensitive search. Defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_group
functions.description: Search for a specific word group (phrase) in the Quran verses. Returns a list of verses where the phrase is found, with support for both case-sensitive and case-insensitive search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: A list of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag to indicate case-sensitive search. Defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_in_surah
functions.description: Search for a word within a specific Surah in the Quran data. Returns a list of verses from the specified Surah that contain the word, using case-insensitive matching.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search for (case-insensitive).

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number to search within.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: A list of dictionaries representing Quran data.

functions.name: search_word_group_in_surah
functions.description: Search for a specific word group (phrase) within a given Surah of the Quran data. Returns verses that contain the specified phrase with an option for case-sensitive matching.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: A list of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to search for.

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number to filter the verses.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag to indicate case-sensitive search. Defaults to False.

functions.name: count_word_occurrences
functions.description: Count the total number of occurrences of a word in the entire Quran text data using a case-insensitive search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: A list of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word whose occurrences need to be counted.

functions.name: count_word_group_occurrences
functions.description: Count the total number of occurrences of a word group (phrase) in the Quran text data using case-insensitive matching.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: A list of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to count occurrences of.

functions.name: search_word_in_verse_range
functions.description: Search for a word within a specified verse range in the Quran data. Returns verses where the word is found between the given start and end verses.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: A list of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search for in the verse range.

parameters.name: start_verse
parameters.description: The starting verse as a tuple (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: end_verse
parameters.description: The ending verse as a tuple (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag for case-sensitive search. Defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_group_in_verse_range
functions.description: Search for a word group within a specified verse range in the Quran data. Retrieves verses containing the phrase between the start and end verses, with an option for case sensitivity.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: A list of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to search for.

parameters.name: start_verse
parameters.description: The starting verse as a tuple (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: end_verse
parameters.description: The ending verse as a tuple (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag for case-sensitive search. Defaults to False.

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_count
functions.description: Search for Quran verses that contain exactly the specified number of words. Returns a list of verses matching the custom word count.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: A list of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word_count
parameters.description: The exact number of words each matching verse must contain.

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_count_multiple
functions.description: Search for Quran verses where the number of words is a multiple of a specified number. Raises a ValueError if the multiple is zero.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: A list of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: multiple_of
parameters.description: The integer multiple that the word count should match. Must be non-zero.

functions.name: calculate_gematrical_value
functions.description: Calculate the gematrical (Abjad) value of a given Arabic word or phrase by summing the numerical values of its characters based on a predefined mapping.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: An Arabic word or phrase to calculate its gematrical value.

functions.name: search_words_by_gematrical_value
functions.description: Search for words in the Quran that match the specified gematrical value. Returns a list of dictionaries containing the matching word and its location (surah and ayah numbers).

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: A list of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: target_value
parameters.description: The target gematrical value to search for.
